document.full_text: the u.s. government said on friday it had struck a deal with wildlife advocates to remove some 1,200 wolves in idaho and montana from the endangered species list.
document.title: wolves could be removed from endangered species list
lines_and_colors: the u.s. government said on friday it had struck a deal with wildlife advocates to remove some 1,200 wolves in idaho and montana from the endangered species list.
